titleInfo.title: Life of Takla Haymanot On f. Ir: ገድስ አበኅ ሃይማናት [Gädlä ʾĀbunä Tä/Haymanot];

subject.topic: Fathers of the church, Syriac.; Haymanot, Takla;

mods.note: f. 3ra-106rb: Life of our Father Takla Haymanot;: includes also “Book of his Birth”, i.e., his genealogy from Adam; f. 107ra,1-118va: Miracles of our Father Takla Haymanot: 18 episodes; f. 119ra,1-123rb,14: Sälam for Takla Haymanot;

originInfo.publisher: Monastery of Gunda Gunde, Ethiopia University of Toronto Scarborough Library; Hill Museum and Monastic Library, Collegeville, Minnesota
